org.ojai

Interface Value

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JsonString

    @API.Public
 @API.NotThreadSafe
public interface Value
extends JsonString

      • getType

        Value.Type getType()
        Returns:
        the Type of this Value

      • getByte

        byte getByte()
        Returns the value as a byte.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this value is not one of the numeric types

      • getShort

        short getShort()
        Returns the value as a short.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this value is not one of the numeric types

      • getInt

        int getInt()
        Returns the value as an int.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this value is not one of the numeric types

      • getLong

        long getLong()
        Returns the value as a long.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this value is not one of the numeric types

      • getFloat

        float getFloat()
        Returns the value as a float.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this value is not one of the numeric types

      • getDouble

        double getDouble()
        Returns the value as a double.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this value is not one of the numeric types

      • getDecimal

        BigDecimal getDecimal()
        Returns the value as a BigDecimal.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this value is not one of the numeric types

      • getBoolean

        boolean getBoolean()
        Returns the value as a boolean.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this value is not of BOOLEAN type

      • getString

        String getString()
        Returns the value as a String.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this value is not of STRING type

      • getTimestamp

        OTimestamp getTimestamp()
        Returns the value as a OTimestamp object.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this value is not of TIMESTAMP type

      • getTimestampAsLong

        long getTimestampAsLong()
        Returns a long value representing the number of milliseconds since epoch.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this value is not of TIMESTAMP type

      • getDate

        ODate getDate()
        Returns the value as a ODate object.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this value is not of DATE type

      • getDateAsInt

        int getDateAsInt()
        Returns a int representing the number of DAYS since Unix epoch.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this value is not of DATE type

      • getTime

        OTime getTime()
        Returns the value as a OTime object. Modifying the returned object does not alter the content of the Value.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this value is not of TIME type

      • getTimeAsInt

        int getTimeAsInt()
        Returns a int representing the number of milliseconds since midnight.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this value is not of TIME type

      • getInterval

        OInterval getInterval()
        Returns the value as a OInterval object. Modifying the returned object does not alter the content of the Value.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this value is not of INTERVAL type

      • getIntervalAsLong

        long getIntervalAsLong()
        Returns a long representing interval duration in milliseconds.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this value is not of INTERVAL type

      • getBinary

        ByteBuffer getBinary()
        Returns the value as a ByteBuffer. Modifying the returned object does not alter the content of the Value.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this value is not of BINARY type

      • getMap

        Map<String,Object> getMap()
        Returns the value as a Map. The returned Map could be mutable or immutable however, modifying the returned Map does not alter the content of the Value.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this value is not of MAP type

      • getList

        List<Object> getList()
        Returns the value as a List<Object>. The returned List could be mutable or immutable however, modifying the returned List does not alter the content of the Value.
        Throws:
        TypeException - if this value is not of ARRAY type

      • getObject

        Object getObject()
        Returns the value as an Object of the underlying type. 
         Type.NULL      => null
 Type.BOOLEAN   => Boolean
 Type.STRING    => String
 Type.BYTE      => Byte
 Type.SHORT     => Short
 Type.INT       => Integer
 Type.LONG      => Long
 Type.FLOAT     => Float
 Type.DOUBLE    => Double
 Type.DECIMAL   => BigDecimal
 Type.DATE      => org.ojai.types.ODate
 Type.TIME      => org.ojai.types.OTime
 Type.TIMESTAMP => org.ojai.types.OTimestamp
 Type.INTERVAL  => org.ojai.types.OInterval
 Type.BINARY    => java.nio.ByteBuffer
 Type.MAP       => Map<String, Object>
 Type.ARRAY     => List<Object>

        Modifying the returned object does not alter the content of the Value.

      • asReader

        DocumentReader asReader()
        Returns a DocumentReader over the current document.
